content.rendered:
Prince of Persia

Prince of Persia is an adventure/platform game where your mission is to bypass the palace dungeons, spikes and deep pits to make princess free. Protagonist main purpose is to save princess in less than 60 minutes. The game takes place in ancient Persia and the main character has some parkour skills you can perform during the game.

This version of Prince of Persia was released for Apple II in 1989 and it consists of 12 levels.

How to Play

Avoid traps and spikes and beat guards on your way but keep in mind to complete your mission in 60 minutes otherwise princess will be gone. At the final stage in level 12 you have to beat Jaffar and break his spell for saving princess.

Developer

Prince of Persia is developed by Jordan Mechner in 1989.
